long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your digital life with our innovative Chrome extension, designed to harness the power of large language models for effortless organization of your Chrome tabs and bookmarks. With just a click, you can group your current window's tabs, automatically generating precise and meaningful group names, or easily revert them back to their ungrouped state. Likewise, managing your Chrome bookmarks has never been easier; our extension allows for the automatic grouping and naming of bookmarks and supports multi-level grouping for an even more organized experience.

What sets our extension apart is the flexibility it offers. You have the freedom to configure the grouping rules for tabs and bookmarks based on specific fields, choose from predefined categories, or opt for fully automated grouping powered by advanced language models. Whether you're someone overwhelmed by too many open tabs during daily browsing, looking for a better way to organize your favorite websites, or simply aiming to streamline your digital workflow, our Chrome extension offers a smart, user-friendly solution.

Install our extension today and transform your browsing experience with unparalleled organization capabilities. Say goodbye to the chaos of countless tabs and bookmarks, and hello to a streamlined, efficient digital environment.
